Name: Clessidra
About the game: In this platform game you will have to overcome challenging puzzles using a weapon capable of rewinding the time of an object. Objects Destroy and rebuild objects to overcome obstacles, press buttons or block enemies. Enemies Harness the power of your weapon to control enemies and eliminate them. Skeletons Revive skeletons to use as bait or to press buttons. Traps Overcome ingenious traps of various types also thanks to your weapon.
Meta Title: Clessidra: Jun 15, 2021, Gabriele Corti and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Clessidra? Check out the release date (Jun 15, 2021), developer insights from Gabriele Corti, and a complete game summary.
